newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: Auridiam recovers diamonds at Ellendale.
newsitem.headline: Auridiam recovers diamonds at Ellendale.

text.p: Auridiam Consolidated NL said on Wednesday it had recovered diamonds from drill hole samples from the Ellendale district in Western Australia.

The company said the recovery of microdiamonds was an uncommon event in an early phase of exploration and as such was considered a significant result. Bulk sampling on Pipe 27B in area E04/813 had started with results expected in coming months. Auridiam is joint venturer with Diamond Ventures NL.
By 2.05 p.m. (0405 GMT), Auridiam shares were 3.5 cents higher at 23.5 cents, while Diamond Ventures were steady at 24.5 cents.
